message.modlistmemory.installCloth: Install Cloth Config API to access mod options
modlistmemory.name: ModListMemory
option.modlistmemory.main.mode.tooltip.R: When you open the mod list, mods that you opened recently will be shown at the top.
When you open the mod list, the scroll value will be set to the most recent value.
option.modlistmemory.main.persistOnResta: Whether memory should persist across game restarts.
option.modlistmemory.main.pinKey.tooltip: Key to hold when clicking to pin or re-pin mods.
option.modlistmemory.main.pinnedModsSize: How many mods can be pinned simultaneously.
option.modlistmemory.main.recentModsSize: How many recent mods can be stored simultaneously.
option.modlistmemory.main.saveOnUpdate.t: Whether, when persisting across restarts, the recently-opened mod list should be saved to file whenever it is updated, instead of only when you quit the game.
option.modlistmemory.main.showBadges.too: Show colored badges for pinned and recent mods.
option.modlistmemory.main.unpinKey.toolt: Key to hold when clicking to unpin mods.
